channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1580; 07:45PM; 1626 W 62nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42ErTBI; Harvard Park; KNOCKDOWN: The first arriving 32 firefighters (additional resources had not yet been in place working at the incident) extinguished the fire in 17 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire extended into the attic. The primary and secondary search was clear with no occupants located inside. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 BC18 E221 E233 E266 E33 E46 E57 E66 EM11 RA33 RA57 RA866 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1580; 07:28PM; 1626 W 62nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/42ErTBI; Harvard Park; One story, single family dwelling with heavy smoke showing. Additional resources requested. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 66; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E221 E233 E266 E33 E46 E57 EM11 RA33 RA57 RA866 T21 T33 T66; CH9; 14; Margaret Stewart

Engine Response; INC#1226; 05:16PM; 17153 W Adlon Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/455g7lu; Encino; At 3:47PM LAFD responded to a reported bee swarm. One adult male patient was transported with multiple bee stings (condition unknown). One adult male (believed to be LAPD volunteer officer or community patrol volunteer) was transported after sustaining an injury while moving away from the bee swarm. Firefighters are informing residents in the area to remain indoors and close all windows/doors. A professional bee removal vendor is required to address the bee swarm. No further details at this time.; FS 83; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; E83 RA83 RA88 RA99; CH8; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0899; 01:07PM; 1426 S Burlington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MtpMLt; Pico-Union; KNOCKDOWN: 32 firefighters extinguished the fire in 26 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters conducted salvage operations inside while fire attack pulled ceiling and attacked the fire from ladders up into the attic space in addition to the truck company assisting from the roof. The building type is updated to a two story three-plex (craftsman style). Cause and $ loss TBD (possibly connected to a roofing operation). No further details.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E10 E11 E13 E210 E211 EA1 RA10 RA11 SQ21 T10 T11; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0899; 12:41PM; 1426 S Burlington Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3MtpMLt; Pico-Union; Two story, craftsman style home with a well developed attic fire. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 13; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 E10 E11 E13 E210 E211 RA10 SQ21 T10 T11; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0867; 12:34PM; 1525 E Alcazar St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Mu3J7B; Boyle Heights; The first arriving fire company extinguished the fire and there are no injuries reported. The fire was prevented from extending to any other vehicles and no damage to the structure. No further details.; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E1 E16 E201 RA1 T1; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0867; 12:25PM; 1525 E Alcazar St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Mu3J7B; Boyle Heights; Six story parking structure with an auto fire on the 4th floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 16; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC2 E1 E16 E201 RA1 T1; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#0416; 07:23AM; Sb 110 Fy; MAP: https://bit.ly/42Wgi0E; Highland Park; Traffic collision with a total of three patients in *at least* serious condition (ages approximate 50yo F, 50yo M, 40yo M). The SB 110 Freeway is CLOSED at E AV 43 due to a large debris field. Drivers are advised to seek alternate routes and follow CHP (Log #682) for traffic updates. No further details.; FS 12; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC2 E1 E212 EM1 RA1 RA12 RA2 T12; CH4; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1128; 05:13PM; 2401 E Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I7tM1I; #Wilmington; It took 34 LAFD firefighters, with automatic aid from LA Co FD, 53 minutes to extinguish heavy fire in a one-story commercial building (not the site of a previous burn, but immediately adjacent to a previous burn). Firefighters set up heavy streams, including ladder pipes, to drown this fire from the exterior of the building, which sustained extensive damage. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E112 E233 E238 E285 E36 RA85 T33 T38 T85; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#1128; 04:20PM; 2401 E Sepulveda Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3I7tM1I; #Wilmington; Approx 50 x 100 single-story commercial structure with heavy fire showing (site of a previous burn. Defensive mode.; FS 38; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; BC6 E238 E285 E36 RA85 T38 T85; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange
